adDetails: Over 50 yrs experienced person to do inexpensive bike repair: - Flat tire repair or replacement. (Repair is first choice unless you want to replace it) - Wheel alignment/tuning - Part replacement, - Removing rust, - Brake and shifting component adjustments - Cleaning/degreasing of drive train - Lubricating all cables and chain - Cleaning - You will be very satisfied with the work! I am in Mountain View! Please email me or call & leave message show contact info. You will be contacted within 12 hours! Thank you for reading and hope to help you get rid of some headaches! --Kent
